product_name: Natural High Three Berry Cobbler - 2 Servings
long_description: A merry berry blend of real boysenberries, blueberries and strawberries plus apples, topped with crunchy chocolate crumbs. Blend mix with boiling water, let stand, sprinkle crumbs on top and serve. All natural ingredients. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. All flavors may contain peanuts, seeds or nut/seed residue as well as trace amounts of dairy. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A merry berry blend of real boysenberries, blueberries and strawberries plus apples, topped with crunchy chocolate crumbs.
